subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Pat Calathes scored 23 points and St. Joseph’s used a 21-3 first-half run to break the game open Wednesday en route to an 80-62 victory against Fordham in the first round of the Atlantic 10 tournament in Atlantic City.
snippet: Pat Calathes scored 23 points and St. Joseph’s used a 21-3 first-half run to break the game open Wednesday en route to an 80-62 victory against Fordham in the first round of the Atlantic 10 tournament in Atlantic City.
